Literature Review: Smart contracts and decentralized finance have revolutionized the way financial transactions are conducted, offering a decentralized, trustless, and transparent alternative to traditional financial systems. In this literature review, we will explore the mechanics of smart contracts, their benefits, limitations, and applications in decentralized finance, including token issuance, decentralized exchanges, and protocols for loanable funds.
